review: Sometimes we experience glitches from it, it will delay playing videos or shows or pause in the middle to load, and sometimes it will not open an app because of a malfunction so we have to restart it.  Also we were unaware it somehow syncs photos from your phone and displays them on the TV as a screensaver. It's a cool feature but not if you don't want your pictures displayed on tv!
